name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with 13+ years of experience in designing and implementing AI/ML solutions, adept in **Python**, **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, **HuggingFace**, and **LangChain**. Proficient in data manipulation and analysis using **Pandas** and **NumPy**, enhancing model training and deployment for intelligent applications.
Skilled in MLOps methodologies, ensuring efficient model lifecycle management through tools like **MLflow** and **Kubeflow**. Strong background in AI ethics and data privacy, ensuring compliance with rigorous industry standards.
Expert in delivering high-performance applications within healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing cutting-edge technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **FastAPI**. Proven ability to deploy scalable systems on cloud platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**, along with a solid grasp of microservices architecture and CI/CD practices. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a commitment to applying agile methodologies for continuous improvement.
